MMM-Wunderlist.author: Paul-Vincent Roll
MMM-Wunderlist.description_long: Displays Wunderlist tasks on your mirror. You can use multiple instances for different lists.

MMM-Facial-Recognition.author: Paul-Vincent Roll
MMM-Facial-Recognition.description_short: Facial recognition and module swapping based on the current user.
MMM-Facial-Recognition.description_long: Facial recognition and module swapping based on the current user.

MMM-FRITZ-Box-Callmonitor.author: Paul-Vincent Roll
MMM-FRITZ-Box-Callmonitor.description_short: Callmonitor for FRITZ!Box users alerting them about incoming calls.
MMM-FRITZ-Box-Callmonitor.description_long: Callmonitor for FRITZ!Box users alerting them about incoming calls. You can specify an address book so that numbers are converted to names.

MMM-wordnik.author: Sam Vendittelli
MMM-wordnik.description_short: Displays the word of the day, its definition, and origin.
MMM-wordnik.description_long: Displays the word of the day, its definition, and origin. Uses the wordnik API.

mmm-systemtemperature.author: Michael Teeuw
mmm-systemtemperature.description_short: Display the temperature of your Raspberry Pi on your Magic Mirror.
mmm-systemtemperature.description_long: Display the temperature of your Raspberry Pi on your Magic Mirror.

MagicMirror-Netatmo-Module.author: CFenner
MagicMirror-Netatmo-Module.description_short: Display informations about your rooms climate from your Netatmo system.
MagicMirror-Netatmo-Module.description_long: Display informations about your rooms climate from your Netatmo system.

MagicMirror-LocalTransport-Module.author: CFenner
MagicMirror-LocalTransport-Module.description_short: This module display the next local transport connection between an origin and destination.
MagicMirror-LocalTransport-Module.description_long: This module display the next local transport connection between an origin and destination.

MM-Scrobbler.author: PtrBld
MM-Scrobbler.description_short: It displays your currently playing music. To use this module you need to have a Last.fm account and scrobble your music.
MM-Scrobbler.description_long: It displays your currently playing music. To use this module you need to have a Last.fm account and scrobble your music.

MagicMirror-Ping-Module.author: CFenner
MagicMirror-Ping-Module.description_short: Module to check the network connection on the MagicMirror.
MagicMirror-Ping-Module.description_long: Module to check the network connection on the MagicMirror.

MagicMirror-Sonos-Module.author: CFenner
MagicMirror-Sonos-Module.description_short: This is an adaption Sonos module.
MagicMirror-Sonos-Module.description_long: This is an adaption Sonos module.

MMM-Traffic.author: SamLewis0602
MMM-Traffic.description_short: The module uses the Google Maps Directions API to get commute time.
MMM-Traffic.description_long: It can display commute time between two given addresses by car, walking, bicycling, or transit. The module uses the Google Maps Directions API to get commute time, which factors in traffic information.
